content.question: Article 6 of the treaty most likely reflected which of the following sentiments?

choices.label: A desire by many American Indians to change their way of life
A hope held by some in government that American Indians would adopt lifestyles similar to the lifestyles of White settlers
A need felt by many American Indians to more clearly legitimize their claims to the land
A wish by some in government to protect American Indian landholdings from encroachments by railroads

content.answer: A hope held by some in government that American Indians would adopt lifestyles similar to the lifestyles of White settlers

topic.text: 6.3: Westward Expansion - Social and Cultural Development
